settings.title: STANDARD SHIPPING
settings.answer:
Enjoy free standard shipping with USPS on orders totaling $50 or more, applicable to all 48 states (excluding Hawaii, Puerto Rico, U.S. Virgin Islands, American Samoa, and Alaska). Your order will be processed, and standard shipping delivery will follow.

Please note: We ship to Hawaii, Guam, Marshall Islands, Northern Mariana Islands, Palau, Puerto Rico, Virgin Islands, Armed Forces Americas, Armed Forces Europe, and Armed Forces Pacific. However, additional postage and fees will be incurred.

Delivery with standard shipping will occur within 5 – 7 business days once your order has been processed and shipped.

This excludes shipping to P.O. Boxes.

settings.title: TRACKING YOUR ORDER
settings.answer: In order to check the status of your order or to track your order shipment, please go to My Account and log in with your user name and password.

settings.title: INTERNATIONAL SHIPPING
settings.answer: We do offer international shipping; however, postage fees will be calculated and applied during the checkout process.

settings.title: US. HOLIDAY SHIPPING
settings.answer:
2023 Holiday Shipping Dates for Contiguous U.S. (Lower 48 States) 

Recommended shipping deadlines for expected delivery before Dec. 25.

USPS holiday shipping deadlines excluding Alaska and Hawaii

Domestic Service

USPS Retail Ground -12/16

First-Class Mail -12/16

Priority Mail - 12/18

Priority Mail Express 12/20

* Actual delivery date may vary and is based on origin, destination, Post Office acceptance time, and other conditions. Last scheduled delivery day is Saturday, Dec. 23 Last scheduled delivery day is Sunday, Dec. 24 for Priority Mail Express if holiday premium is paid. 

For Priority Mail Express shipments mailed Dec. 22–Dec. 25, the money-back guarantee applies only if the shipment was not delivered or delivery was not attempted within 2 business days.-

** Alaska & Hawaii - Actual delivery date may vary and is based on origin, destination, Post Office™ acceptance time, and other conditions.  For packages under 1 pound. As of Aug. 1, 2023, USPS will no longer process refund requests for guaranteed service on these items. Refund requests for loss will still be processed.

UPS 2023 Holiday Season Shipping:

Monday, Dec. 18

Normal pickup and delivery service.

Tuesday, Dec. 19

Normal pickup and delivery service. This is the last day to ship UPS 3 Day Select® packages for delivery on Friday, Dec. 22

Wednesday, Dec. 20

Normal pickup and delivery service. This is the last day to ship UPS 2nd Day Air® packages for delivery on Friday, Dec. 22.

Thursday, Dec. 21

Normal pickup and delivery service. This is the last day to ship UPS Next Day Air® packages for delivery on Friday, Dec. 22.

Friday, Dec. 22

Normal pickup and delivery service.

Saturday, Dec. 23

Normal Saturday pickup and delivery service. UPS Next Day Air® packages picked up today will be scheduled for delivery on Tuesday, Dec. 26.

Sunday, Dec. 24, Christmas Eve

No UPS pickup or delivery service. UPS Express Critical® service is available. Call 1-800-714-8779 or visit upsexpresscritical.com.

Monday, Dec. 25, Christmas Day (UPS Holiday)

No UPS pickup or delivery service. UPS Express Critical® service is available. Call 1-800-714-8779 or visit upsexpresscritical.com.
